dialogue.htmlContent:
You find yourself going past a quaint village, standing out in the middle of the frosty mountainside. A shabby sign barely spells out "Nirth", and you can see a few figures moving about in the houses, getting ready for the day. As a refuge for the harsh winterland around it, Nirth seems like quite an appealing place, despite looking quite run down.

Due to the fact that it's still quite early in the morning, the villagers don't take much notice of you; most of them are probably just going about their everyday business. The villagers seem to be comprised of mostly winterland types, with heavy fur and strong bodies.

The village seems to be surrounded by a wooden fence, and upon entering through the only open gate, you see that the houses are all made of wood as well.

#IF(game.getCurrentWeather()==WEATHER_SNOW)

The ongoing snow doesn't seem to bother the inhabitants at all, in fact, it almost seems like there's more of them.

#ENDIF
